Facebook Messenger Clone (Mobile App)

Description:  
This is a Facebook Messenger clone built as a mobile app, providing a real-time messaging experience. It leverages Flutter for the front-end development and Firebase for the back-end database and authentication, ensuring seamless real-time communication and data synchronization.

Features:  
- User authentication (registration, login)  
- Real-time one-on-one messaging  
- Firebase integration for database and authentication  
- Typing indicators and message read receipts  
- User presence (online/offline status)  
- Push notifications for new messages  
- Responsive and intuitive user interface  

Technologies Used:  
-  Framework : Flutter (Dart)  
-  Database : Firebase Firestore  
-  Authentication : Firebase Authentication  
-  Real-Time Communication : Firebase Realtime Database / Firestore  
  

 How to Run :  
1. Clone the repository
  
2. Install dependencies:  
   ```bash
   flutter pub get
   ```  
3. Configure Firebase(if required):  
   - Set up a Firebase project and download the `google-services.json` file (for Android) and/or `GoogleService-Info.plist` (for iOS).  
   - Place these files in the respective directories in your Flutter project.  

4. Run the app:  
   ```bash
   flutter run
     

5. Test on a device or emulator:  
   - Ensure your emulator or physical device is set up to run the app.
